Uses of Package
net.jini.loader.pref

Packages that use net.jini.loader.pref
net.jini.loader.pref Provides class loader and RMIClassLoader provider implementations that support preferred classes.  
 

Classes in net.jini.loader.pref used by net.jini.loader.pref
PreferredClassLoader
          A class loader that supports preferred classes.
PreferredClassProvider
          An RMIClassLoader provider that supports preferred classes.
